content: PSU Pipe saddle with U-Bolt Connectors and U-Bolts for attaching single pipe runs to vertical MT box profiles ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Pipe supports- ### FEATURES:Features Provides an easy-to-install, adjustable and flexible solution which eliminates the need for welding Height can be adjusted easily Designed for fast, one-person installation Applications For use with with MT girders to fix and support pipes Supporting pipes for industrial, energy, civil and heavy commercial applications ### TECHNICAL DATA: Environmental conditions: Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) Technical Data | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) ### ITEMS- 2199861 - Pipe saddle and U-bolt PSU 2 - Package Size 10 pc Package Contents: - 1x 2 Pipe ring saddle - 2199862 - Pipe saddle and U-bolt PSU 2-1/2 - Package Size 10 pc Package Contents: - 1x 2-1/2 Pipe ring saddle - 2199863 - Pipe saddle and U-bolt PSU 3 - Package Size 10 pc Package Contents: - 1x 3 Pipe ring saddle - 2199865 - Pipe saddle and U-bolt PSU 4 - Package Size 10 pc Package Contents: - 1x 4 Pipe ring saddle - 2199866 - Pipe saddle and U-bolt PSU 5 - Package Size 10 pc Package Contents: - 1x 5 Pipe ring saddle - 2199867 - Pipe saddle and U-bolt PSU 6 - Package Size 10 pc Package Contents: - 1x 6 Pipe ring saddle - 2199868 - Pipe saddle and U-bolt PSU 8 - Package Size 4 pc Package Contents: - 1x 8 Pipe ring saddle - 2199869 - Pipe saddle and U-bolt PSU 10 - Package Size 4 pc Package Contents: - 1x 10 Pipe ring saddle - 2199870 - Pipe saddle and U-bolt PSU 12 - Package Size 4 pc Package Contents: - 1x 12 Pipe ring saddle
